topic.title: What happens if you set back your system clock?
topic.body: This is what happens, your post goes to the past.

topic.title: a bug in zeronet (your posts goes to the past if you set back your system clock)
A proxy server can actually "steal" your master seed by using "--multiuser_local"

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Testing posting with your system clock set back.
test with system clock set back to two days ago

1_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1.body:
> [waterrabbit](#comment_106_1LxkfGxtWhktAJ5WJ9ZnKxksTSH37qm8cC): What happens if you set your system clock forward?Your post goes to the top.ZeroMe refuses to show it.

And if you set your system clock back, ZeroMe will refuse to show posts after that.
